page.title: 04OLD COTTAGES IN THORNHILL.
page.content: {bathroom, dining room, lounge, {kitchen, conservatory and pantry. Since Dawn has moved in the house has had woodworm which has now been killed. Dawn has found some old {pottery}in the garden also some china bits. Even some from a dolls tea set. They used to have{pigs {in one of the bedrooms}many years ago. Thornhill has a number of cottages which belonged to the farms. Most of them have been sold to private owners. Mr.Hammond has built some new houses near his farm for some of his workers.
